Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute near Halsted/90th
ShortDescription: #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Summit, Vincennes, 95th, due to street blockage near Halsted/90th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Summit, Vincennes, 95th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/90th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand: due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand and the resume their normal route at  Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.
